definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

crab of the family Potamidae of freshwater crabs

sentences.english: The roast beef and deviled crab are very good today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的烤生肉和炒辣味蟹都很好。

sentences.english: Someone feel leg meat is delicious.
sentences.chinese: 也有人觉得蟹脚上的肉是最鲜美的。

sentences.english: All crabs are fed with fresh sardine fish.
sentences.chinese: 所有软壳蟹均用新鲜沙丁鱼喂食。

sentences.english: One day, he and his daughter crawled to the bank to apply for credit.
sentences.chinese: 一天蟹和他女儿一起爬到银行去申请信用贷款。

sentences.english: The next day she noticed her new husband walking sideways like all the other crabs 2, and got upset.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，她又发现她的新郎像其他蟹一样横着走路了。

sentences.english: The knots, it turns out, aren't getting enough horseshoe crab eggs to eat.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，红腹滨鹬没有吃到足够的马蹄蟹卵。

sentences.english: I love eating Crab, and I love the sea.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，有点跑题，从吃蟹跑到看海了。

sentences.english: The fiddler crab is a living clock.
Tremor disease (TD) is the most serious epizootic of the crab in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 而颤抖病是近年来中华绒螯蟹最严重的流行病。

sentences.english: Xing, a crab fisherwoman at Yangcheng Lake in eastern China
sentences.chinese: 邢女士说，她是中国东部阳澄湖的一名蟹农。

sentences.english: Mr. Fish invited the crab and his daughter into his cozy office.
sentences.chinese: 鱼先生把蟹和他女儿请进他舒适的办公室。

sentences.english: Other students constitution looking for the hermit crab and the fiddler crab observation in other places.
sentences.chinese: 其他的同学则在外面找寄居蟹和招潮蟹观察。

sentences.english: The fish and crabs scavenge for decaying tissue.
sentences.chinese: 鱼和蟹搜寻腐烂的组织为食。

sentences.english: The dual nature of Cancerians will determine their life in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年，巨蟹宫的双重性将会决定蟹蟹们的命运。

sentences.english: The dual nature of Cancerians will determine their life in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年，巨蟹宫的双重性将会决定蟹蟹们的命运。

sentences.english: You will also see some white near the thigh on either side of things, it was inedible.
sentences.chinese: 另外，蟹腿处白色的蟹白部分，是不可能食用的。
